gersteinlab/ML-Bench

Benchmarks LLMs for end-to-end machine learning workflows

Related repos

  • Benchmark for LLMs on software engineering tasks
  • Benchmark for evaluating LLMs on real-world GitHub issues
  • platform for tracking, packaging, and managing machine learning models
  • Open-source tools for running and improving LLM applications—gateway, observability, data feedback, optimization
  • Open cookbook for building top-tier code LLMs with complete training data and reproducible pipeline
  • curated list of datasets and tools for LLM post-training
  • Fine-tunes LLMs on Apple silicon
  • open-source memory engine for LLMs and AI agents
  • Benchmark for LLM agents reproducing scientific findings
  • Open-source toolkit for building scalable LLM inference infrastructure
